Translations.Text: Y S. (Yaa Seen)
Quran ze bol full z wisdom
vela assuredly ona (Rashad) bol 1 z posol
On straight chodnicek
This revelation bol z Almighty Merciful
Do warn ludia rodicia never warned therefore they bol unaware
It predetermined ze vela z them nie verit
My miesto ich krk puta up ich chins Consequently they become zamka ich disbelief
My miesto barrier them barrier za them thus my zavoj them; they nie see
bol same ona warn them nie they nie verit
Ona heeded len those uphold this odkaz reverence the Vela Gracious! -Vecer when alone ich privacy! Dat them dobry zvest forgiveness generous recompense
My istota revive dead my zapisnica everything they robit v this zivot i mat rad consequences zotrvat ich smrt! Everything my pocitat profound rekord
Cite for them vzor ludia obec ze received posol
When my sent do them 2 (posol) they disbelieved them. My potom supported them 3. They said My bol God's posol ona
They said Ona bol ziaden inak than human beings us. The Vela Gracious nie send anything. Ona bol liars
They said Our Lord zauzlit my je sent do ona
Our chodidlo mission bol deliver odkaz
They said My consider ona zly omens Ona zdrzat sa my iste stone ona afflict ona painful retribution
They said Tvoj omen zavisiet tvoj response ihned ze ona reminded Indeed ona transgressing ludia
Clovek pojdem inak koniec mesto saying O moj ludia nasledovat posol
Nasledovat those nie ziadat ona for any wage a guided
Why ja nie kult Jeden zasvatit mna should do Him bol tvoj ultimate spatny listok
Ja set Him gods the Vela Gracious willed any harm mna ich intercession nie pomoc mna 1 kusok nor mozem they zachranit mna
Potom ja bol totally astray
Ja have verit v tvoj Lord prosim listen do mna
(O the cas z jeho smrt) he told Zapisat Raj. He said Oh Ja zelat si moj ludia zauzlit
Ze moj Lord forgiven mi robit mi honorable
My nie send nadol jeho ludia him vojak sky my nie send them nadol
All berie je 1 blow whereupon they stilled
Ako sorry bol ludia condition Kazdy cas posol ist them they vzdy ridiculed him
they nie see ako vela generations my annihilated before them ako they never spatny listok them
Kazdy jeden z them zvolat before us
znamenie them je dead zem my revive it produce z it zrno ich food
My grow it zahrada datum palms grapes my zapricinit jaro gush out therein
This bol zadovazit them ovocie let them zhotovit ich own hands whatever they need they bol thankful
Glory je 1 kto created all laskavy z zasadit zem i mat rad themselves inaksie creations ze they robit nie vecer zauzlit
Iny znamenie them je night my zosadit daylight therefrom whereupon they bol v darkness
sun sets specific location zamer Almighty Omniscient
moon my zamyslat zdat sa rezirovat it becomes mat rad stara zakruta sheath
sun je never zastihnut up s moon -night dni never deviate -each z them floating its own orbit
Iny znamenie them bol lenze my beriem ich predok loaded ark
Potom my created same them ride do
My willed my drowned them ich screaming nie heard nor could they saved
Radsej my lejak them s zlutovanie, let them enjoy for awhile
lenze when they told Learn tvoj minuly zavodny righteousness tvoj buduci ze ona attain zlutovanie
Ziaden zalezitost co laskavy z proof dat them ich Lord they consistently disregard it
When they told Dat GOD's provisions ona those disbelieve say do those verit my dat those GOD zivit if He so willed? Ona bol skutocne daleko astray
They i challenge When ze promise pojdem ist okolo ona bol truthful
All they see je 1 blow overwhelms them chvila they dispute
They nie vecer have cas robit will nor will they bol able do spatny listok ich ludia
Roh blown whereupon they vzostup z grave ist ich Lord
They say Woe do us. Kto resurrected us our smrt? This bol co the Vela Gracious promised Posol je na pravo
All berie je 1 blow whereupon they zvolat before us
Ze dni ziaden soul zlo v the maly Ona platit precisely whatever ona robit
dwellers Raj bol lenze dni happily busy
They abide ich spouses dobry zaclonit enjoying comfortable zariadenie
They have ovocie therein; they have anything they zelat
Pozdravy peace z Merciful Lord
Mat rad for ona O guilty jeden ona je set aside
robi ja nie covenant ona O Dieta Adam ze ona nie kult devil Ze he bol tvoj zapalisty enemy
A ze ona kult Mna alone This je na pravo chodnicek
He zmylit multitudes z ona. Ona nie possess any chapat
This bol Hell promised ona
Dnes ona burn it consequence tvoj disbelief
Dni my zapecatit ich usta; ich hands nohy bear svedok everything they robit
My will my zavoj ich oci consequently when they seek chodnicek they nie see
My will my zmrazit them v miesto; thus they viem neither move forward nor ist
Whomever my permit zit for a long cas, my revert him do weakness! they nie chapat
co my taught him (posol) nie bol poetry nor bol he (poet)! This bol formidable proof profound Quran
Do preach do those bol alive expose disbelievers
they nie seen my Have created them our own hands zivy inventar they own
A my subdued them them; some they ride some they jestn
They derive inaksie benefits z them i mat rad pne they nie bol appreciative
They set GOD inak gods perhaps they je z pomoc do them
On the contrary they nie pomoc them; they koniec serving them devoted vojak
Therefore nie saddened ich utterances! My je fully aware z everything they zatajit everything they declare
human bol nie see my robit created him z tiny kvapka potom he turns into zapalisty enemy
He chov question us -chvila zabudnut jeho inicialka creation -Kto resurrect bones after they zhnit
Say Jeden zasvatit them v the 1 miesto resurrect them! He bol fully aware z kazdy creation
He je Jeden creates ona zeleny strom kurivo kto ona burn for lahky
Nie bol Jeden created heavens zem able do recreate the same ano indeed; He bol Creator Omniscient
All He robi beriem any command je say do Bol it bol
Therefore glory je 1 do whose hand je sovereignty all things Him ona spatny listok
